content: **crocheted jumper with short sleeves / t-shirt in drops sky piece is crocheted top down with round yoke and lace pattern size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-166 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 13 light jeans blue crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
